union all
SELECT T006EmployeeSiteInfo.employeeNo, T006EmployeeSiteInfo.nonSitePeriod, T006EmployeeSiteInfo.nonSiteMonths FROM T006EmployeeSiteInfo WHERE employeeNo = #{employeeNo}

mapper.select:
SELECT T001.employeeNo, T005.nextBonusMonth FROM T001Employee AS T001 LEFT JOIN T005WagesInfo AS T005 ON T001.employeeNo = T005.employeeNo LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T005k.employeeNo, MAX( T005k.reflectYearAndMonth ) AS reflectYearAndMonth FROM T005WagesInfo AS T005k GROUP BY T005k.employeeNo ) AS T005date ON T001.employeeNo = T005date.employeeNo WHERE T005.reflectYearAndMonth = T005date.reflectYearAndMonth AND T005.nextBonusMonth != ''
AND T001.employeeNo = #{employeeNo}
